product_name: Lezyne Macro Drive Front Bike Light
long_description: A sleek, bright handlebar light to shine 350 lumens on dark bike paths, the Lezyne Macro Drive Front Bike Light offers high durability in a machined body and recharges via USB cable after your ride. A single LED emits a 350-lumen beam that runs for 1 hr. on high and 5 hrs. on flashing; recharge after your ride with the included USB cable. Light can be seen from the side to enhance visibility in traffic. A specialized power-saving mode allows quick switching between high lighting and medium lighting to optimize the use of power for any occasion. Power Indicator button allows the user to check the power level any time. The Lezyne Macro Drive Front Bike Light includes a Lezyne wall adaptor to recharge at an outlet, Micro USB charging cable and handlebar mounts.
